synopsis.text:
Paprika" > Immerse yourself in the world of Ani*Kuri15, a captivating collection of 15 one-minute shorts, masterfully crafted by a diverse group of talented animators from Japan's thriving animation industry. The title, Ani*Kuri15, is a clever blend of 'anime' and 'creators', perfectly encapsulating the essence of this unique project.

Season One takes you on a thrilling ride with Shinji Kimura's "Attack of Higashimachi 2nd Borough" and Shōjirō Nishimi's "Invasion from Space - Hiroshi's Case". Delve into the emotional depths of Akemi Hayashi's "From the Other Side of the Tears" and savor the aromatic charm of Osamu Kobayashi's "The Aromatic Tea Blues". Round off the season with the fiery excitement of Yasufumi Soejima's "Blaze Man".

Season Two continues the journey with the visionary works of Mamoru Oshii's "Project Mermaid" and Kazuto Nakazawa's "'yurururu' ~Nichijou Hen~". Get entangled in the intricate designs of Ranji Murata and Tatsuya Yabuta's "Gyrosopter" and experience the thrill of Tobira Oda and Yasuyuki Shimizu's "Sport Captain Episode No.18: Assassin Descended from the Mountain Hunt!". The season concludes with Atsushi Takeuchi's enchanting "Wandaba Kiss".
